title: The world's biggest sovereign wealth fund is using Anthropic's Claude AI model to screen investments for ethical issues
summary_full: Norway’s $2 trillion wealth fund is reviewing its ethical framework after decisions on U.S. and Israeli companies drew ire from the Trump administration.
